item.title: My friend declared bankruptcy. Can creditors still go after him for child support, back taxes and student debt?
item.description: “Most of those old debts are credit-card debts.”

item.title: ‘I’m trying not to go bankrupt’: My husband of 24 years asked for a divorce. He wants my cell-phone records. Should I report him for tax fraud?
item.description: “I would like to keep the house because my grown children and grandchildren reside there.”

item.title: ‘I want to enjoy the rest of my years’: I’m 65, retired and own my home. I have $300,000 to invest. What should I do with it?
